title-group.article-title: Considering Channelling and Transpersonal Phenomena from a Quantum Physics and Developmental Perspective

contrib.aff: Private practice, P.O. Box 3551, Knysna, South Africa

permissions.copyright-statement: © 2012 South African Psychological Association and the Psychological Institute of the Republic of South Africa
permissions.copyright-holder: South African Psychological Association and the Psychological Institute of the Republic of South Africa

abstract.p: This paper is divided into two sections. The first section considers the phenomenon of channelling and other transpersonal experiences and concepts in the light of recent research papers on aspects of quantum physics. In the second section, the author discusses research into the possibility that the human capacity for transpersonal experience may be understood from a developmental perspective.

OwenM. J. (2000). Rhythms of influence: the moon cycles and the life of C.G.Jung. Draft manuscript
RowanJ. (2005). The transpersonal (2nd ed.). East Sussex: Routledge
